records.text: Phones need to be like PCs.  I buy the hardware mix I want, then I install whatever distro I like on it.  The hardware doesn't need to be piecemeal like some computer builds, but there would be a host of options like there are now - ram/storage/display, camera, ruggedness, etc.  I install the OS I want.  Then, much like my computers, I can pop the SIM into what I feel I need that day.  Going hiking?  Use the rugged/big battery beast.  Photos? Get the one you can snap your Moment lenses onto.
